universum.studios.android.setting

Class SettingDateTimeDialogPreference<O extends DialogOptions<O>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.preference.Preference
      • universum.studios.android.setting.SettingPreference
        • universum.studios.android.setting.SettingDialogPreference<O>
          • universum.studios.android.setting.SettingDateTimeDialogPreference<O>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Preference>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SettingDateDialogPreference, SettingTimeDialogPreference

    public abstract class SettingDateTimeDialogPreference<O extends DialogOptions<O>>
extends SettingDialogPreference<O>
    A SettingDialogPreference implementation that is used as base for dialog preferences through which a user can pick its preferred date or time for a specific setting preference.

    This preference implementation by default displays the preferred date/time value formatted by format specified via setFormat(SimpleDateFormat) as summary text. The subclasses of this preference may specify theirs specific format which will be then used to format the summary text whenever the picked date/time value changes. If no value is persisted the standard summary text is displayed.

    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

      • onGetSummaryText

        @Nullable
protected CharSequence onGetSummaryText()
        This implementation formats the current date/time value, if it is set, by format specified via setFormat(SimpleDateFormat), if any. If there is no date/time value and format set the standard summary text that may be obtained via Preference.getSummary() is returned.
        Overrides:
        onGetSummaryText in class SettingDialogPreference<O extends DialogOptions<O>>
        Returns:
        The actual summary text that should be presented in the summary view of this preference.
